sentence: Diversity and inclusion is a core company value at all levels.
paraphrased: At all levels, diversity and inclusion are essential organizational values.

sentence: We are now four times safer as a company than we were in 2003.
paraphrased: As a corporation, we are now four times safer than we were in 2003.

sentence: By increasing crop yields, we help limit the conversion of carbonsequestering forests into farmland.
paraphrased: We reduce the conversion of carbon-sequestering forests into cropland by boosting crop yields.

sentence: Reduced transportation fuel usage rate by 25% since 2009.
paraphrased: 25% less transportation petroleum has been used since 2009.

sentence: We place the highest importance on maintaining compliance with competition laws globally.
paraphrased: The upkeep of global compliance with competition rules is of utmost concern to us.

sentence: Going forward, Prologis will report progress toward converting the portfolio to 100% LED.
paraphrased: Prologis will update investors on its progress toward transitioning the portfolio to 100% LED in the future.

sentence: In the U.S., we’ve increased our focus on buying products from local suppliers and farmers .
paraphrased: In the United States, we now place more emphasis on purchasing goods from regional producers and suppliers.

sentence: Educational outreach efforts can help keep our customers and communities safe in case of emergency.
paraphrased: Outreach programs aimed at educating the public can contribute to the safety of our clients and the communities we serve.

sentence: Promote the use o f sustainability metrics in industry sourcing .
paraphrased: Encourage the use of sustainability metrics in procurement for industry.

sentence: We also operate our plants efficiently using captured waste heat.
paraphrased: We utilize captured waste heat to efficiently run our facilities.

sentence: To achieve this , we donate our time, tickets , funds , and , most importantly, our LUV.
paraphrased: We give our time, tickets, money, and most importantly, our LUV to accomplish this.

sentence: If requested, employees are expected to participate in an investigation of a report.
paraphrased: Employees are expected to take part in a report investigation if asked.

sentence: Safety is a core value and a key priority at Xcel Energy.
paraphrased: At Xcel Energy, safety is a top priority and a core value.

sentence: We focus on minimizing the impact our water use has on regions where we operate.
paraphrased: Our main goal is to have as little of an impact as possible on the areas in which we operate.

sentence: In 2001-02, SBC made at least $1,480,645.00 in political contributions.
paraphrased: SBC donated at least $1,480,645.00 to politics in 2001-02.

sentence: We share these safety innovations openly with others in the industry.
paraphrased: We publicly communicate these safety innovations with other business stakeholders.

sentence: An independent third party operates the Action Line to ensure confidentiality.
paraphrased: The Action Line is run by a separate third party to maintain privacy.

sentence: We also look for opportunities to increase water efficiency and recycle wastewater where feasible.
paraphrased: We also search for chances to improve water usage and recycle wastewater when it can be done.
